archimate:Requirement.name: SD.2.3.12: Any unlicensed or unapproved software identified should be investigated and resolved (e.g. by purchasing new licences, removing unlicensed software or renegotiating contracts).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
